Articles.Content:
I\'ve modded over 30 pieces from various mods, including, but not limited to, Jelleycube\'s Railguns, Novapunch, Novapunch Odin, C7 Flight Pack, Kosmos, SBS, and the LI Lander set.

I\'ve kept the .DAE files, since I suck at making them, and modded the .png textures, leaving any mesh files alone, and making my own .cfg files.

Would I be able to share this on the forum, due to the .DAE and .png files not being my own exactly?

S:|

You will need to get permission from the original author before doing so. Depending on the author they may not let you because they don\'t like derivitives of their work, or want older versions out there still.

As for my mods; Keep in mind I don\'t own the original models of most of novapunch, so if Nova or SundayPunch were to ever rescend permission, you would have to take them down (just as I would)

For my part, I\'d want to see what you have planned, if its a cohesive mod or just random things.

Well, basically it\'s a collection of pieces for making small vehicles capable of DSTM or SSTM (Dual or Single Stage To MÃ¼n) travel.

While the pieces are small and relatively light, they are incredibly expensive, going for upwards of $10000 Kerbal apiece.
I don\'t know if you\'d find much interest in cheat parts like that. Perhaps later when kerbits are an actual part of the game.
True. That\'s the same thing Jeb said when my success rates for MÃ¼n landings reached %1.00.
